issue.title: [C#] Support reading and writing Date32 and Date64 arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6728](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6728). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The C# implementation doesn't support reading and writing Date32 and Date64 arrays. We need to add support and some tests.

It looks like it is only a couple of lines to get this enabled. See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5413>.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6728?focusedCommentId=16954229) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5413
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5413>
